title: ‘The Capacity Is There’: Ben O’Connor’s Coach Backs Vuelta a España Victory Chances
content:
Stephen Barrett clear on Australian race leader’s qualities: ‘He’s come fourth in the Giro, he’s come fourth in the Tour.’

Read the full article at ‘The Capacity Is There’: Ben O’Connor’s Coach Backs Vuelta a España Victory Chances on Velo.
author: sstokes
